name: queue-flow
description: Chainable logic built on named (or not) queues for Javascript and Node.js
author: David Ellis

scripts.prepublish: npm test && docco ./lib/queue-flow.js && uglifyjs ./lib/queue-flow.js > ./lib/queue-flow.min.js && git commit -am "Automatic doc and minification for version $npm_package_version" && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags
